detaileddescription.para: Log dir value: string, eg: "C:\\Users\\Administrator\\Desktop\\log"; val_size: string length
Whether to save draw value: bool, eg: true; val_size: sizeof(bool)
Dump all screenshots and actions Recording will evaluate to true if any of this or MaaCtrlOptionEnum::MaaCtrlOption_Recording is true. value: bool, eg: true; val_size: sizeof(bool)
The level of log output to stdout value: MaaLoggingLevel, val_size: sizeof(MaaLoggingLevel) default value is MaaLoggingLevel_Error
Whether to show hit draw value: bool, eg: true; val_size: sizeof(bool)
Only one of long and short side can be set, and the other is automatically scaled according to the aspect ratio. value: int, eg: 1920; val_size: sizeof(int)
Only one of long and short side can be set, and the other is automatically scaled according to the aspect ratio. value: int, eg: 1080; val_size: sizeof(int)
For StartApp value: string, eg: "com.hypergryph.arknights/com.u8.sdk.U8UnityContext"; val_size: string length
For StopApp value: string, eg: "com.hypergryph.arknights"; val_size: string length

Dump all screenshots and actions Recording will evaluate to true if any of this or MaaGlobalOptionEnum::MaaGlobalOption_Recording is true.
value: bool, eg: true; val_size: sizeof(bool)

briefdescription.para: Option keys for controller instance options. See MaaControllerSetOption().

detaileddescription.para: The ADB controller type consists of three parts: touch, key, and screencap. The touch part is used to control the touch events on the device. The key part is used to control the key events on the device. The screencap part is used to capture the screen of the device. The final value is the combination of the three parts as follows:
See AdbControllerTypeEnum to know how the value is composed.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* MaaAPICallback) (MaaStringView msg, MaaStringView details_json, MaaTransparentArg callback_arg)
memberdef.name: MaaAPICallback

parameterdescription.para: The details in JSON format. See doc in MaaMsg.h
